description:
W A S D - Move

Enjoy the story!

This game is made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme "Rewind". It is about a high school student who played too many games until he has forgotten to study for his exams. When all hope is lost, a fairy appears and rewinds the time. He gets to spend his night once again. This time, he decided to spend his time reading a book instead of playing video games...
